nodes.text: A cape was a loose-fitting outer garment that was fastened at the wearer's neck and draped from the shoulders. Landonis Balthazar Calrissian wore capes as a statement of style and fashion.
A cape was a sleeveless outer garment that was fastened at the neck and fell loosely from the shoulders. During the Clone Wars, the planet Abafar hosted a cape retailer named Land O' Capes.

Lando Calrissian, the Baron Administrator of Cloud City, often wore fashionable capes for style, as did the Dark Lord of the Sith and former Jedi Master Dooku. The cyborg General Grievous, leader of the droid armies of the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars also often wore a cape. The suit of armor of another Dark Lord, Darth Vader, also included a black cape.

Director Orson Krennic affected a white cape with his Imperial uniform. Captain Phasma of the First Order wore a black and red armorweave cape over her chromium-coated armor. Her colleague, the dark side warrior Kylo Ren, began wearing a black cape in the aftermath of the Battle of Starkiller Base.
